meanings.definition: Prepare (written material) for publication by correcting, condensing, or otherwise modifying it.
meanings.sent1: I will edit my essay before submitting it to my teacher.
meanings.sent2: She likes to edit her photos before posting them online.
meanings.sent3: I tried to edit my shopping list, but it ended up being longer than before!
meanings.sent4: Her magic wand seemed to edit the reality around her.
meanings.sent5: The editor's job is to edit the articles to make them perfect.

meanings.definition: Make changes to (data) in order to prepare it for printing or display.
meanings.sent1: He needs to edit the spreadsheet before sharing it with the team.
meanings.sent2: The graphic designer will edit the images for the presentation.
meanings.sent3: I accidentally hit edit instead of save, and now everything is messed up!
meanings.sent4: The artist's brush seemed to edit the colors on the canvas.
meanings.sent5: The software allows you to edit the text easily.
